subject: Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Kildow said Thursday that she would miss the rest of the season with a knee injury, ending her bid to become the first female American racer to win skiing’s World Cup super-G title.
snippet: Lindsey Kildow said Thursday that she would miss the rest of the season with a knee injury, ending her bid to become the first female American racer to win skiing’s World Cup super-G title.
